column4: depending on what your question about it is ... I have a Toshiba satellite and can start it up with the Ubuntu live CD.
I'd be no help with anything network related about it, though -- I think the PCMCIA slots are dead on the Satellite.
hmmm. Does your help require Ubuntu to be *installed* on the laptop, or just running? I think that ACPI questions would only be applicable to a system with Ubuntu installed, sadly.
yes, Ubuntu is running fine, I can't get stand-by to work
Ah, I don't think I can be any help to you on that front, then, sorry.
